main event: A civilian witness reported seeing a white, rotating or oscillating object about 20-25 feet in size, flying in a straight horizontal path for approximately 30-32 seconds.
interesting points: The object appeared to be white in color and was rotating or oscillating.
The object was moving in a straight horizontal flight path.
The sighting occurred at around 2230Z on July 21, 1960, near Fort Worth, Texas.
The witness was sitting on their back porch when they observed the object.
The object disappeared instantaneously into the southwest without fading in size.
sighted object: a white, rotating or oscillating object
location: 4.5 miles southwest of Fort Worth, Texas
